system.description:
Your travels have led you to experience a little bit of everything. You score a critical success on ability checks on a roll of 19–20. If you already have a feature that increases the range of your critical successes, your critical success range increases by 1 (maximum 17–20). Whenever you would roll on an Ability Check Critical Success table, roll twice and choose one of the results. If both rolls are identical, reroll one of them.

Finally, whenever you gain a sign of faith, you may instead choose an adventuring trick from the bard class or an exploration knack from the ranger class, substituting your cleric level for any level prerequisites.
